notes.description: Configuration for funding rate arbitrage opportunity finder and bot
notes.min_combined_volume_usd: Minimum 24h volume in USD (Extended + Pacifica combined)
notes.max_intra_exchange_spread_pct: Maximum bid-ask spread % within each exchange (Extended and Pacifica)
notes.min_net_apr_pct: Minimum net APR % (funding rate arbitrage profit after spreads)
notes.max_position_size_usd: Maximum notional USD value per position (applied per exchange, limited by available capital)
notes.hold_time_hours: Time in hours to hold a position before considering rotation (default: 48)
notes.fetch_timeout_seconds: HTTP request timeout for API calls
notes.rate_limit_delay_ms: Delay between sequential requests to avoid rate limiting
notes.bot_behavior: Bot monitors every 15 minutes, holds positions for configured hold_time_hours before rotation, uses 95% of minimum available capital (capped by max_position_size_usd), uses market orders with 5 retry attempts
